ygData.subject: Re: War and Peace
ygData.msgSnippet: Wildrider fell back from his crash and transformed. If his face wasnt mangled, he woulda been smilling from ear to ear. As it was, something that could be his

Subject: Re: War and Peace
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Wildrider fell back from his crash and transformed. If his face wasnt
mangled, he woulda been smilling from ear to ear. As it was, something that
could be his eye was dangling, and half of his face was burnt beyond
recognision. Before Firearm shot he smiled and held up his gun towards him,
and started cackling loudly, "ha ha hah , boy, you Maximals sure cant take
it, wonder why Motormaster had problems with you, mppphh, maybe hes getting
soft, aw well" he leveled his gun, but because of his babbling, he didnt
see the two charges coming, and takes the shot in his chest and face, with
sparks erupting, the force drives him back, and the second one sends him
flying in the same direction Drag Strip was sent. As he went soaring all
that could be heard was maniacle laughter.
